ATK.
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Battle Moves/Traits: ATK.
By Trickster on Sunday, April 16, 2006 - 04:17 pm:

TraitDescriptionAnima Cost
Lucky StarThis Trait makes it easier to apply critical damage when hitting an enemy but doesn't work for non-critical skills.2000
Clean HitThis increases damage when making critical hits.1500
Smash HitThis is an up-grade of Clean Hit. This tremendously increases the damage applied when making critical hit.2500
MagicianWhen hitting an enemy this makes it easier to change their state.1100
WarriorPow. Type Skills increase in power while Int. Type Skills decrease in power.1500
HerculesThis is an up-grade of Warrior. Int. Type Skills increase in power while Pow. Type SKills decrease in power.2500
CalmInt. Type Skills increase in power while Pow. Type Skills decrease in power.1500
NirvanaThis is an up-grade of Calm. Int. Type Skills increase in power while Pow. Type Skills decrease in power.2500
InfighterWhen performed using Short-range Skills the HitRate increases.1300
SniperWhen performed from Far-range Skills the HitRate increases.1300
Full PowerWhen performed using Short-range Skills the LifeDamage increases.1200
Full ShotWhen performed using Far-range Skills the LifeDamage increases.1200
StunWhen performed using Short-range Skills the GutsDamage increases. However this does not work for non GutsDamage Skills.1400
ShockWhen performed using Far-range Skills the GutsDamage increases. However this does not work for non GutsDamage Skills.1400
SupportThis increases the effectiveness of Support Skills.1000
MaximizeWhen Guts are above 50 the higher your Guts are the more damage you will inflict.2000
Heat UpWhen Guts are above 50 the higher your Guts are the better your HitRate.2000

By JQuill687 on Sunday, April 16, 2006 - 04:31 pm:

Just in case some people don't know, some traits have stronger follow-ups. I know for certain once a monster gets Calm it can then get Nirvana, which is stronger than Calm and costs 2500 Anima. I'm guessing at least Warrior has the same thing, and probably other traits as well.

By Trickster on Sunday, April 16, 2006 - 04:43 pm:

Heh, yup, you caught it before I'd edited in some stuff, and added the first info message for the page one back. ;)

By Apocalypse on Sunday, April 23, 2006 - 11:58 am:

^typo on Hercules, Pow. skills go up and int. skills go down.
